author: TMac

review: The Fire Tv is a great product. It's very fast and offers and endless amount of entertainment. It's great for watching Netflix, Hulu and the WWE network. The only reason I don't give it 5stars is that I was not able to watch videos that I have stored via a separate hard drive. It has a USB port but won't read a separate hard drive that is connected to it.if they are able to fix that then I would rate this item with 5 stars.
